query:
INSERT INTO roles (name, displayName, description, level, isSystem, maxUsers) VALUES
('owner', 'Owner', 'Full system access. Cannot be deleted or modified.', 100, TRUE, 1),
('superadmin', 'Super Admin', 'Full administrative access across all modules.', 90, TRUE, 3),
('admin', 'Admin', 'Administrative access to most modules. Cannot manage system settings.', 80, TRUE, NULL),
('hr_manager', 'HR Manager', 'Manage learners, cohorts, and view reports for enterprise clients.', 60, TRUE, NULL),
('coach', 'Coach', 'Manage own sessions, view assigned learners, access coaching tools.', 40, TRUE, NULL),
('editor', 'Content Editor', 'Create and edit courses, lessons, and CMS content.', 30, FALSE, NULL),
('viewer', 'Viewer', 'Read-only access to dashboards and reports.', 20, FALSE, NULL),
('learner', 'Learner', 'Access courses, practice sessions, and personal dashboard.', 10, TRUE, NULL)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE displayName = VALUES(displayName);
